project.name: Dashboard & Persistence Architecture
project.description: Dashboard organization with auto-discovery and data loss prevention system

attributes.task.title: Dashboard & Persistence Architecture
attributes.task.description: Organize dashboards by extension with auto-discovery and proactive data loss prevention

attributes.task.title: Phase 1: Dashboard Folder Structure
attributes.task.description: Reorganize dashboards from flat json/ folder into extension-specific folders

attributes.task.title: Create core dashboard folder
attributes.task.description: Create grafana/provisioning/dashboards/core/ directory

attributes.task.title: Create extension folders
attributes.task.description: Create folders for squirrel, rabbit, beaver, fox, coyote, external

attributes.task.title: Move core dashboards
attributes.task.description: Move portfolio, installation, project-progress, project-operations, sprint-metrics to core/

attributes.task.title: Move squirrel dashboards
attributes.task.description: Move skills-browser, value-capabilities to squirrel/

attributes.task.title: Move rabbit dashboards
attributes.task.description: Move workflow.json to rabbit/

attributes.task.title: Move external dashboards
attributes.task.description: Move agent-trigger.json to external/

attributes.task.title: Update dashboard UIDs
attributes.task.description: Rename UIDs to contextcore-{extension}-{name} format in JSON files

attributes.task.title: Phase 2: Grafana Multi-Provider Config
attributes.task.description: Update Grafana provisioning to auto-load from multiple extension folders

attributes.task.title: Backup existing dashboards.yaml
attributes.task.description: Copy current config to dashboards.yaml.bak

attributes.task.title: Create multi-provider config
attributes.task.description: Write new dashboards.yaml with provider per extension

attributes.task.title: Test Grafana reload
attributes.task.description: Restart Grafana, verify all dashboards appear in correct folders

attributes.task.title: Phase 3: Discovery Module
attributes.task.description: Create Python module for auto-discovering dashboards from filesystem and entry points

attributes.task.title: Create discovery.py module
attributes.task.description: New file: src/contextcore/dashboards/discovery.py

attributes.task.title: Implement EXTENSION_REGISTRY
attributes.task.description: Define registry mapping extension IDs to folder names/UIDs

attributes.task.title: Extend DashboardConfig
attributes.task.description: Add extension and file_path fields to dataclass

attributes.task.title: Implement discover_from_filesystem
attributes.task.description: Function to scan folders and parse JSON metadata

attributes.task.title: Implement discover_from_entry_points
attributes.task.description: Function to load from Python entry points

attributes.task.title: Implement discover_all_dashboards
attributes.task.description: Combine both sources with deduplication

attributes.task.title: Add discovery unit tests
attributes.task.description: Test discovery with mock filesystem and entry points

attributes.task.title: Phase 4: Provisioner Update
attributes.task.description: Integrate the discovery module into the existing DashboardProvisioner

attributes.task.title: Import discovery module
attributes.task.description: Add imports from discovery.py to provisioner.py

attributes.task.title: Remove DEFAULT_DASHBOARDS
attributes.task.description: Remove hardcoded list, use discovery instead

attributes.task.title: Update provision_all method
attributes.task.description: Add extension parameter, use discover_all_dashboards()

attributes.task.title: Update provisioner tests
attributes.task.description: Test with mocked discovery results

attributes.task.title: Phase 5: CLI Enhancements
attributes.task.description: Add extension filtering and new commands to dashboard CLI

attributes.task.title: Add --extension flag to provision
attributes.task.description: Filter provisioning by extension

attributes.task.title: Add --source flag to list
attributes.task.description: Option to show local, grafana, or both

attributes.task.title: Create extensions command
attributes.task.description: New command: contextcore dashboards extensions

attributes.task.title: Phase 6: Persistence Detector
attributes.task.description: Create module to detect what data needs persistence and derive importance

attributes.task.title: Create persistence module
attributes.task.description: Create src/contextcore/persistence/__init__.py

attributes.task.title: Create detector.py
attributes.task.description: Main detection logic file

attributes.task.title: Implement DataSource dataclass
attributes.task.description: Model for a persistent data source

attributes.task.title: Implement _scan_docker_compose
attributes.task.description: Parse docker-compose.yaml for volumes

attributes.task.title: Implement _derive_importance
attributes.task.description: Use .contextcore.yaml business criticality

attributes.task.title: Phase 7: Pre-Destroy Warning System
attributes.task.description: Enhance make destroy with data inventory and export options

attributes.task.title: Create persistence CLI
attributes.task.description: Create src/contextcore/cli/persistence.py

attributes.task.title: Implement inventory command
attributes.task.description: contextcore persistence inventory shows data sources

attributes.task.title: Add data-inventory Makefile target
attributes.task.description: New target that calls persistence inventory

attributes.task.title: Update destroy target
attributes.task.description: Add interactive menu: export all, export dashboards, or proceed

attributes.task.title: Phase 8: Telemetry Exporter
attributes.task.description: Export actual trace, metric, and log data

attributes.task.title: Create exporter.py
attributes.task.description: New file: src/contextcore/persistence/exporter.py

attributes.task.title: Implement _export_traces
attributes.task.description: Export from Tempo via /api/search + /api/traces

attributes.task.title: Implement _export_metrics
attributes.task.description: Export from Mimir via Prometheus query_range API

attributes.task.title: Implement _export_logs
attributes.task.description: Export from Loki via LogQL query_range API

attributes.task.title: Add export CLI command
attributes.task.description: contextcore persistence export -t 24h -o ./backups/

attributes.task.title: Phase 9: Audit Trail
attributes.task.description: Record all destructive operations for accountability

attributes.task.title: Create audit.py
attributes.task.description: New file: src/contextcore/persistence/audit.py

attributes.task.title: Implement AuditEvent dataclass
attributes.task.description: Model for audit record

attributes.task.title: Add audit CLI command
attributes.task.description: contextcore persistence audit shows history

attributes.task.title: Integrate with destroy
attributes.task.description: Record audit event on destroy operations
